```{r setup, include=FALSE}

acab <- read_csv("data/fatal-police-shootings-data.csv")
```
```{r}
hateCrimes <-  read_csv("data/table-1.csv") %>%
	janitor::clean_names()
hateCrimesWide <- hateCrimes %>%
	group_by(bias_motivation) %>%
	summarise(total = incidents) %>%
	spread(key=bias_motivation, value=total, fill=0)
g <- hateCrimesWide %>%
	ggplot(aes(x= c("Anti-Asian", "Anti-Black or African American","" )))
g + geom_bar()
	
acab1 <- acab %>%
	levels(race)
acab1
g1 <- acab %>%
	ggplot(aes(x=race, fill=race))
g1 + geom_bar()
	+ labs()
```
